sourcesContent:
import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; import { PostsService } from '../services/posts.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-post', templateUrl: './post.component.html', styleUrls: ['./post.component.css'] }) export class PostComponent { @Input() posts:any; constructor(private postsService:PostsService){} }
